article_title: Red Hat: Partners should address healthcare's new IT needs
article_text:
New for 2016! Keeping up with security landscape that has evolved quickly and continues to increase in complexity is becoming a real challenge for channel firms. Our event will shed light on the most significant challenges and suggest possible strategies for overcoming the most pressing issues.

Date: 29 Jun 2016

Chicago

article_metadata.description: Compliance issues arise from ACA, HIPPA and more
